title: Self-Tuning for SQL Performance in Oracle Database 11g.
abstract: Commercial database customers across the board list SQL performance tuning as one of the most time-consuming tasks for database administrators (DBAs). The 10g Oracle Database provides a feature called the SQL Tuning Advisor to simplify the task. The 11g release adds a new database feature, called Automatic SQL Tuning, that closes the feedback loop for the first time, fully automating the SQL tuning workflow and solving some SQL performance problems without any DBA intervention.
